verbose_text: Hydrogen peroxide (H 2 O 2) induced a concentration dependent increase in DNA breakage, PARP activation, depletion of intracellular ATP, inhibition of mitochondrial activity and two distinct parameters that quantify the breakdown of plasma membrane integrity (propidium iodide uptake or lactate dehydrogenase release).
evidence: Hydrogen peroxide (H 2 O 2 ) induced a concentration-dependent increase in DNA breakage, PARP
